Spells.name: Acid Arrow
Spells.fluffDescription: A shimmering green arrow streaks toward a target within range and bursts in a spray of acid.
Spells.mechanicalDescription: Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 4d4 acid damage immediately and 2d4 acid damage at the end of its next turn. On a miss, the arrow splashes the target with acid for half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.
Spells.higherCast: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage (both initial and later) increases by 1d4 for each slot level above 2nd.

Spells.name: Acid Splash
Spells.fluffDescription: You hurl a bubble of acid and it makes a wet pop on impact.
Spells.mechanicalDescription: Choose one creature within range, or choose two creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 acid damage
Spells.higherCast: This spellâ€™s damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).

Spells.name: Burning Hands
Spells.fluffDescription: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips.
Spells.mechanicalDescription: Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.
Spells.higherCast: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st

Spells.name: Chain Lightning
Spells.fluffDescription: Static discharges dance around your whole body as you extend your hand forwards. A bright bolt of lightning erupts from your palm, ringing your ears.
Spells.mechanicalDescription: Three bolts then leap from that target to as many as three other targets, each of which must be within 30 feet of the first target. A target can be a creature or an object and can be targeted by only one of the bolts. A target must DEX save. Target takes 10d8 lightning damage on a failed save, half damage on a successful one.
Spells.higherCast: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, one additional bolt leaps from the first target to another target for each slot level above 6th.

Spells.name: Power Word Kill
Spells.fluffDescription: Your voice brims with deadly power. You utter a fathomless word and the target is compelled to instantly die.
Spells.mechanicalDescription: If the creature you choose has 100 hit points or fewer, it dies. Otherwise, the spell has no effect.
Spells.higherCast: This spell does not have a higher cast.
